DOC.brief_summary: The study will determine the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of aripiprazole lauroxil in adults with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Aripiprazole Lauroxil in Subjects With Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder
DOC.criteria: Has a diagnosis of chronic schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder Has demonstrated ability to tolerate aripiprazole Has been on a stable antipsychotic medication regimen without any changes for at least 2 months prior to screening Has a body mass index (BMI) of 18.0 to 40.0 kg/m2, inclusive Additional criteria may apply Is pregnant, is planning to become pregnant, or is currently breastfeeding Has received aripiprazole lauroxil or IM depot aripiprazole within 6 months, or other longacting, injectable antipsychotic medication within 3 months or currently treated with clozapine Is a danger to himself/herself at screening or upon admission Has a history of or positive test result for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), hepatitis B, or hepatitis C Has a positive urine drug screen at screening or Day 1 Additional criteria may apply
